subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Ben Roethlisberger was cleared Thursday by the N.F.L. to return to the Pittsburgh Steelers beginning next week, although no decision has been made on the length of his suspension.
snippet: Ben Roethlisberger was cleared Thursday by the N.F.L. to return to the Pittsburgh Steelers beginning next week, although no decision has been made on the length of his suspension.
